input_email_body:
Subject: Urgent: Critical AWS Service Outage

Dear IT Services Support Team,

I am writing to inform you about a high-priority ticket raised regarding a critical service outage within our AWS Management Service. Our cloud infrastructure operations are currently severely impacted, and this outage poses a significant threat to our business continuity and operational efficiency.

We encountered this issue around 3 PM today, and since then, we have been facing substantial disruptions in handling our cloud infrastructure You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. Due to this outage, crucial operations dependent on AWS services are currently non-functional, affecting numerous team workflows and client-facing applications.

We urge your immediate assistance in diagnosing this issue and providing a swift resolution to prevent any further impact on our operations. Timely intervention is essential to mitigate risks and resume normal operations promptly.

Please find all relevant details attached to the ticket number <ticket_num> My name is Maria Gonzalez.. Your prompt response to our situation would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your urgent attention to this matter.

Best regards,

<name>
<company_name>
<tel_num>
<email_address>
